item.title: Trump Administration Considers Jerome Powell Replacement, Confirms Scott Bessent
item.description: Jerome Powell’s time as Chairman of the U.S. Federal Reserve seems to be drawing to a close. As Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent revealed that the Trump administration is indeed searching for a replacement. In a Bloomberg interview last week, Bessent said the administration would start within the next few weeks and could announce a replacement by October. Powell’s current term expires in May 2026. item.title: Supreme Court Denies Coinbase User Appeal: IRS Can Still Access Your Crypto Data – What Now?
item.description:

item.title: Microsoft Removes Password Management from Authenticator App Starting August 2025
item.description:
Microsoft has said that it's ending support for passwords in its Authenticator app starting August 1, 2025.
The changes, the company said, are part of its efforts to streamline autofill in the two-factor authentication (2FA) app.

Cybersecurity researchers have detailed a new campaign dubbed OneClik that leverages Microsoft's ClickOnce software deployment technology and bespoke Golang backdoors to compromise organizations within the energy, oil, and gas sectors.
"The campaign exhibits characteristics aligned with Chinese-affiliated threat actors, though attribution remains cautious," Trellix researchers Nico Paulo

item.title: NVIDIA Confirms 580 Linux Driver Is The Last For Maxwell / Pascal / Volta
item.description: NVIDIA previously warned CUDA users that CUDA 12.x is the last for Maxwell, Pascal, and Volta GPUs. NVIDIA overnight now officially confirmed that the Maxwell / Pascal / Volta GPU support is going to end in their Linux driver with the upcoming NVIDIA R580 Linux driver series...

item.title: Connecticut Goes Anti-Crypto as Governor Lamont Signs Bill Banning State Digital Asset Investments
item.description:
Connecticut Governor Ned Lamont has signed into law a comprehensive "Bitcoin Reserve Ban" prohibiting state digital asset investments, contrasting sharply with 26 states that have introduced 47 Bitcoin reserve bills, as Texas and New Hampshire lead adoption efforts.

The post Connecticut Goes Anti-Crypto as Governor Lamont Signs Bill Banning State Digital Asset Investments appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Mystery Wallet Sends $20K to Satoshi Nakamoto’s Address – Accident or Tribute?
item.description:
An unknown wallet has sent $20,000 worth of Bitcoin to Satoshi Nakamoto's legendary Genesis Block mining address, marking the largest transfer to the Bitcoin creator's wallet holding approximately $117 billion in dormant Bitcoin in four months.
